```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

Months and solstice/equinox for both hemispheres

```{r}
#Months
months_format_nh <- data.frame(Season = c("Spring", "Summer", "Autumn", "Winter", "Winter"),
                            start = c(yday("2021-03-01"),
                                      yday("2021-06-01"),
                                      yday("2021-09-01"),
                                      yday("2021-12-01"),
                                      yday("2021-01-01")),
                            end = c(yday("2021-06-01"),
                                    yday("2021-09-01"),
                                    yday("2021-12-01"),
                                    yday("2021-12-31"),
                                    yday("2021-03-01"))) %>%
  mutate(Method = "Months",
         Hemisphere = "Northern")

months_format_sh <- data.frame(Season = c("Autumn", "Winter", "Spring", "Summer", "Summer"),
                            start = c(yday("2021-03-01"),
                                      yday("2021-06-01"),
                                      yday("2021-09-01"),
                                      yday("2021-12-01"),
                                      yday("2021-01-01")),
                            end = c(yday("2021-06-01"),
                                    yday("2021-09-01"),
                                    yday("2021-12-01"),
                                    yday("2021-12-31"),
                                    yday("2021-03-01"))) %>%
  mutate(Method = "Months",
         Hemisphere = "Southern")

#Solstice/equinox
solstice_format_nh <- data.frame(Season = c("Spring", "Summer", "Autumn", "Winter", "Winter"),
                              start = c(yday("2021-03-20"),
                                        yday("2021-06-20"),
                                        yday("2021-09-22"),
                                        yday("2021-12-21"),
                                        yday("2021-01-01")),
                              end = c(yday("2021-06-20"),
                                      yday("2021-09-22"),
                                      yday("2021-12-21"),
                                      yday("2021-12-31"),
                                      yday("2021-03-20"))) %>% 
  mutate(Method = "Solstice/equinox",
         Hemisphere = "Northern")

solstice_format_sh <- data.frame(Season = c("Autumn", "Winter", "Spring", "Summer", "Summer"),
                              start = c(yday("2021-03-20"),
                                        yday("2021-06-20"),
                                        yday("2021-09-22"),
                                        yday("2021-12-21"),
                                        yday("2021-01-01")),
                              end = c(yday("2021-06-20"),
                                      yday("2021-09-22"),
                                      yday("2021-12-21"),
                                      yday("2021-12-31"),
                                      yday("2021-03-20"))) %>% 
  mutate(Method = "Solstice/equinox",
         Hemisphere = "Southern")

write.csv(months_format_nh %>%
            full_join(solstice_format_nh), 
          "../01b_Processed_data/Temperate_seasons_nh.csv", 
          row.names = FALSE)
write.csv(months_format_sh %>%
            full_join(solstice_format_sh), 
          "../01b_Processed_data/Temperate_seasons_sh.csv", 
          row.names = FALSE)
```
